title: Unicode?
body: It amazes me that in 2015 we don't have Unicode support for international languages. Wow, just wow.

replies.body: Each region has the symbols used in their predominant language available. There's a help article somewhere telling you which characters are enabled in which regions.
Aaaand that does not answer my question.
Probably because you didn't ask one.

Yes. Just not on this server. Here's both the support page link and the relevant section copy pasted:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Can I have a special character in my Summoner name?

Special characters are allowed in some Summoner Names depending on the selected language. If a special character is not utilized in the selected language, it will not be available to be used even if it is on a region that allows it.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I know not on this server, that's the problem. I play with the Korean client regardless, but there's a lot of Korean people that come to Australia and play on the OCE client. It's just rather annoying for them to type in romanisation, when it's such a simple thing to implement.
